explanation: [0-0] A man in a black shirt, blue pants, and white shoes is standing on a lawn, smiling and holding a tray. The background is a vast lawn and blue sky, with several tall trees scattered around. A pair of black shoes is placed next to him. In front of him, several people are sitting on a blanket spread out on the ground.

[0-3] The man hands the tray to another friend wearing a white short-sleeved blue denim jacket who is part of the picnic. After receiving the tray, he places it in the middle of the group. Another man wearing a black hoodie and greyish-white pants vigorously overturns a pot he is holding onto the tray.
